project_descr: The Programme is helping to build the national and regional risk governance enabling environment to improve the resilience of Pacific communities. It is being delivered in four Pacific island countries - Solomon Islands, Vanuatu, Tonga and Fiji

outputs.output_descr: Participating countries integrate CCDRM (including recovery) and GSI principles into national needs assessment, planning, budgeting,information systems, and coherent development planning (including performance frameworks) while diffusing this innovation.
